collectible.title: Aura Camera
collectible.subtitle: "Can't you tell just by looking?"
collectible.text:
A futuristic camera made by Parfet Balblair, Chief Engineer on the Nirvana. Given to their young nurse Paiway as a toy with which she can "Pai-check" racy situations.
In addition to regular photos, it can reveal the "emotional wavelengths" given off by the subject. Their Paksis Pragma fusion core feeds off of these to produce energy. Perhaps the same is true of all living things.

collectible.title: Flightsuit
collectible.subtitle: Comfortable, practical, and very flattering.
collectible.text:
Standard-issue among all Magno's Family pilots---pilfered from Mejare imperials. As Chief Pilot, Meia wears full armor instead, so her suit lacks the shoulder pads. Too bad you don't get the bust boost.

It feels like a second skin---anything you wear beneath would show through. But despite its tightness, it's both strong and breathable. There's extra give around the chest and hips.

You get the impression Mejare has spent a lot of time on its craftsmanship.
collectible.unlock: Take Meia to a place she likes.

メイア・ギズボーン
Meia Gisborn
Rank: Chief Pilot
Age: 20
Blood Type: B
Birthday: June 10th
Height: 169 cm
Weight: 51 kg
B-W-H: 78-61-88 cm
Voice: Fumiko Orikasa

Pilots a special silver Dread fighter, as well as the eagle-like "White Wing" Vandread mech, known for its acceleration and ramming speed. As her Dread has been modified, it no longer fits in the platforms for standard orders.

collectible.title: Music Box
collectible.subtitle: Somedays It's a Wonderful World.
collectible.text:
A gift Meia received from her parents. When opened, plays a song from Earth, the planet of their ancestors.
Clockwise from top right: Meia's Fama; Meia, age 6; Meia's Oma, now restored. Behind the photo is a mirror.
